findings.name: divide-before-multiply
findings.message:
VotingEscrow._floorToWeek(uint256) (src/VotingEscrow.sol#391-393) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- (_t / WEEK) * WEEK (src/VotingEscrow.sol#392)

findings.name: incorrect-equality
findings.message:
VotingEscrow._supplyAt(VotingEscrow.Point,uint256) (src/VotingEscrow.sol#534-563) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- iterativeTime == _t (src/VotingEscrow.sol#552)

findings.name: incorrect-equality
findings.message:
VotingEscrow._checkpoint(address,VotingEscrow.LockedBalance,VotingEscrow.LockedBalance) (src/VotingEscrow.sol#142-286) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- iterativeTime == block.timestamp (src/VotingEscrow.sol#239)

findings.name: uninitialized-local
findings.message: VotingEscrow._checkpoint(address,VotingEscrow.LockedBalance,VotingEscrow.LockedBalance).userNewPoint (src/VotingEscrow.sol#148) is a local variable never initialized

findings.name: uninitialized-local
findings.message: VotingEscrow.checkpoint().empty (src/VotingEscrow.sol#290) is a local variable never initialized

findings.name: uninitialized-local
findings.message: VotingEscrow._checkpoint(address,VotingEscrow.LockedBalance,VotingEscrow.LockedBalance).userOldPoint (src/VotingEscrow.sol#147) is a local variable never initialized
